tool_description: All cryptocurrency exchanges integrated under a single API
name: CoinAPI - REST
title: CoinAPI - REST

api_list.name: List all exhanges
api_list.description: Get a detailed list of exchanges provided by the system.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coinapi.p.rapidapi.com/v1/exchanges"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coinapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://coinapi.p.rapidapi.com/v1/exchanges"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coinapi.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: List all assets
api_list.description: Get detailed list of assets.
api_list.code:

        }

api_list.name: List all symbols
api_list.description: Get detailed list of all symbols.

optional_parameters.name: filter_symbol_id
optional_parameters.description: Part of symbol identifier used to filter response.

api_list.name: Get specific rate
api_list.description: Get exchange rate between pair of requested assets at specific or current time.

required_parameters.name: asset_id_base
required_parameters.description: Requested exchange rate base asset identifier.

required_parameters.name: asset_id_quote
required_parameters.description: Requested exchange rate quote asset identifier.

optional_parameters.name: time
optional_parameters.description: Time at which exchange rate is calculated (optional, if not supplied then current rate is returned)

api_list.name: Get all current rates
api_list.description: Get the current exchange rate between requested asset and all other assets.

required_parameters.name: asset_id_base
required_parameters.description: Requested exchange rate base asset identifier.

api_list.name: OHLCV List all periods
api_list.description: Get full list of supported time periods available for requesting OHLCV timeseries data.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coinapi.p.rapidapi.com/v1/ohlcv/periods"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coinapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: OHLCV latest data
api_list.description: Get OHLCV latest timeseries data for requested symbol and period, returned in time descending order.

optional_parameters.name: include_empty_items
optional_parameters.description: Include items with no activity? (optional, default value is false, possible values are true or false)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Amount of items to return (optional, mininum is 1, maximum is 100000, default value is 100, if the parameter is used then every 100 output items are counted as one request)

api_list.name: OHLCV historical data
api_list.description: Get OHLCV timeseries data for requested symbol and period, returned in time ascending order.

required_parameters.name: period_id
required_parameters.description: Identifier of requested timeseries period (required, e.g. 5SEC or 2MTH)

optional_parameters.name: time_end
optional_parameters.description: Timeseries ending time in ISO 8601 (optional, if not supplied then the data is returned to the end or when count of result elements reaches the limit)

optional_parameters.name: include_empty_items
optional_parameters.description: Include items with no activity? (optional, default value is false, possible values are true or false)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Amount of items to return (optional, mininum is 1, maximum is 100000, default value is 100, if the parameter is used then every 100 output items are counted as one request)

api_list.name: All latest trade data
api_list.description: Get latest trades from all symbols up to 1 minute ago. Latest data is always returned in time descending order.

optional_parameters.name: filter_symbol_id
optional_parameters.description: Part of symbol identifier used to filter response.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Amount of items to return (optional, mininum is 1, maximum is 100000, default value is 100, if the parameter is used then every 100 output items are counted as one request)

api_list.name: Latest trade data - specific symbol
api_list.description: Get latest trades from a specific symbol without time limitation. Latest data is always returned in time descending order.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Amount of items to return (optional, mininum is 1, maximum is 100000, default value is 100, if the parameter is used then every 100 output items are counted as one request)

api_list.name: Trade historical data
api_list.description: Get history transactions from specific symbol, returned in time ascending order.

optional_parameters.name: time_end
optional_parameters.description: Timeseries ending time in ISO 8601 (optional, if not supplied then the data is returned to the end or when result elements count reaches the limit)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Amount of items to return (optional, mininum is 1, maximum is 100000, default value is 100, if the parameter is used then every 100 output items are counted as one request)

api_list.name: Quotes current data
api_list.description: Get current quotes for all symbols

optional_parameters.name: filter_symbol_id
optional_parameters.description: Part of symbol identifier used to filter response.

api_list.name: Quotes current data - specific symbol
api_list.description: Get current quotes for a specific symbol

api_list.name: Quotes latest data
api_list.description: Get latest quote updates up to 1 minute ago. Latest data is always returned in time descending order.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Amount of items to return (optional, mininum is 1, maximum is 100000, default value is 100, if the parameter is used then every 100 output items are counted as one request)

optional_parameters.name: filter_symbol_id
optional_parameters.description: Part of symbol identifier used to filter response.

api_list.name: Quotes latest data - specific symbol
api_list.description: Get updates for a specific symbol without time limit. Latest data is always returned in time descending order.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Amount of items to return (optional, mininum is 1, maximum is 100000, default value is 100, if the parameter is used then every 100 output items are counted as one request)

api_list.name: Quotes historical data
api_list.description: Get historical quote updates within requested time range, returned in time ascending order.

optional_parameters.name: time_end
optional_parameters.description: Timeseries ending time in ISO 8601 (optional, if not supplied then the data is returned to the end or when result elements count reaches the limit)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Amount of items to return (optional, mininum is 1, maximum is 100000, default value is 100, if the parameter is used then every 100 output items are counted as one request)

api_list.name: Orderbook current data
api_list.description: Get current orderbook snapshot for all symbols

optional_parameters.name: filter_symbol_id
optional_parameters.description: Part of symbol identifier used to filter response.

api_list.name: Orderbook current data - specific symbol
api_list.description: Get current orderbook snapshot for a specific symbol

api_list.name: Orderbook latest data
api_list.description: Get latest orderbook snapshots for a specific symbol, returned in time descending order.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Amount of items to return (optional, mininum is 1, maximum is 100000, default value is 100, if the parameter is used then every 100 output items are counted as one request)

api_list.name: Orderbook historical data
api_list.description: Get historical orderbook snapshots for a specific symbol within time range, returned in time ascending order.

optional_parameters.name: time_end
optional_parameters.description: Timeseries ending time in ISO 8601 (optional, if not supplied then the data is returned to the end or when result elements count reaches the limit)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Amount of items to return (optional, mininum is 1, maximum is 100000, default value is 100, if the parameter is used then every 100 output items are counted as one request)

api_list.name: Twitter Latest data
api_list.description: Get latest tweets related to cryptocurrency markets, returned in time descending order.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coinapi.p.rapidapi.com/v1/twitter/latest"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coinapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Twitter historical data
api_list.description: Get historical tweets related to cryptocurrency markets, returned in time ascending order.

optional_parameters.name: time_end
optional_parameters.description: Timeseries ending time in ISO 8601 (optional, if not supplied then the data is returned to the end or when result elements reaches count the limit)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Amount of items to return (optional, mininum is 1, maximum is 100000, default value is 100, if the parameter is used then every 100 output items are counted as one request)
